nodes.bodyText: Can you put a similar check in CriteriaTree component to limit selections in the hierarchy view also? I was able to max it out, then switch to the tree and select more concepts. If the layout works, it may be better to move the message up to CriteriaSearch so we can use the same one for both views.

Also, can you change=== to >= so it will disable in case somehow we get more more than 1000 selections?
And should we remove source !== 'criteria' since I think we need this limit fo cohort builder also? We'd just need to show different text in the message if source === 'criteria'.
I was not able to check the tree structure for concept Set. Regarding cohort i will create another PR just to keep them separate.

nodes.bodyText: I think we should consolidate these since the styles are the same. Maybe rename to something like disableIcon so it make sense for both cases.
selectIconStyle should be on the second icon here. First icon should still be {...styles.selectIcon, ...styles.selected}
This message should move up to CriteriaTree or CriteriaSearch. Currently it displays above every tree node:
